ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: In this course, professors from Yale or other institutes will be invited to our department to talk about their research field about microbiology. It is useful to quickly get information on specific fields. So I'd like to recommend it to other students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course gave me an overview about the interest of research in several specific field. The talks in the past year were helpful because I got a lot of information that was relevant to my research. I hope in the future I can get more useful information from it. It would be better to read some papers about the topic every time before the talk so I would understand the talks better.
